articles.description: The Super Mario Bros. Movie is jumping ever closer to $1 billion in its third weekend in theaters as it has brought in another $58.23 million domestically on its way to a global total of $871.83 million.

articles.author: Claire Comstock-Gay
articles.title: Weekly Horoscopes for the Week of April 24 by the Cut - The Cut
articles.description: A list of all the horoscope signs (Aries, Taurus, Gemini, Cancer, Leo, Virgo, Libra, Scorpio, Sagittarius, Capricorn, Aquarius, Pisces) and their weekly horoscopes, by the Cut’s astrologer Madame Clairevoyant.
articles.content: This week, the waxing moon moves through Gemini, Cancer, and Leo. As the moon appears to grow in the sky, you can commit to growth too. This is a time for moving forward and doing the work to make yo… [+7277 chars]
